CustomField.description: This checkbox is used in the validation rules and when set to true, allows user to make modifications in the User fields for X seconds.
CustomField.formula:
/*Set checkbox to TRUE for X seconds. Checks if Validation Bypass DateTime (custom field) is greater than CURRENT TIME - X seconds otherwise set checkbox to FALSE. */
Validation_Bypass_DateTime__c > (NOW() - 0.00002314814814814814) /*Two Seconds*/
CustomField.label: Validation Bypass
